summary: high-quality, high-resolution,handmade texture replacer for tsun set
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=red]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive-release[/b], 
 please respect my decision and 
[b]DO NOT reupload it elsewhere...[/b]. 
I did not give nor want to give permission for any kind of reupload.


the mod: 

[center][color=red][size=5][b]High Resolution Texture-Replacer for Tsun set[/b][/size][/color][/center] 

[size=3] 

  
   ***  As usual, everything has been redone from scratch.

   ***   Same resolution as the official high-res DLC textures

   ***   This work should be compatible with pretty much everything, including remodeled mesh versions (for various body replacers) and mods using parts of the set.

   ***  [b]INSTALLATION[/b]: to install just drop the \"textures-folder\" inside your data-folder or use mod manager.[/size]

  ***   ultra hd resolution 4096X4096 cuirass 2048x2048 boots is available, NOT recomended for weak machines

armor is not playable in default game my idea was to make it a bit better, there are some mods on nexus to let the player use this set  ,just search for \"tsun\" and anyway any mesh up using parts of this set will be 200% enhanced.

[youtube]sEyT7PHBi-A[/youtube] [youtube]vjzCXtH8nvI[/youtube]
